text: Abu Hider () is a Bangladeshi First class and List A cricketer. He is a Left- arm fast-medium Bowler and a Right-hand batsman.Abu Hider made his Twenty20 International debut against Zimbabwe on 2016. == References == ==Other websites== * Abu Hider from ESPNcricinfo * Abu Hider from CricketArchive Category:Cricketers from Dhaka Category:1996 births Category:Living people
title: Abu Hider
